title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Arboriculture
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Arboriculture 

Industry) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (arboriculture industry) order 2020

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 2. Subject to Article 3, the following activities are hereby declared to be
text_raw:
2. Subject to Article 3, the following activities are hereby declared to be 
designated industrial activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 
1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the planting, preservation, treatment, training and protection of 
trees, shrubs, vines and other perennial woody plants; 

the lopping, pruning, removal and felling of trees, shrubs, vines 
and other perennial woody plants; and 

the inspection and survey of trees, shrubs, vines and other 
perennial woody plants.
text_norm: 2 subject article 3 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) (b) (c) planting preservation treatment training protection tree shrub vine perennial woody plant lopping pruning removal felling tree shrub vine perennial woody plant inspection survey tree shrub vine perennial woody plant

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 3. Article 2 shall be construed as excluding the activities at Article 2(a) –
text_raw:
3. Article 2 shall be construed as excluding the activities at Article 2(a) – 

(c) when undertaken for the purposes of primary production.
text_norm: 3 article 2 shall construed excluding activity article 2(a) - (c) undertaken purpose primary production

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: In this Order, "primary production" means the cultivation of horticultural
text_raw:
4. 

In this Order, "primary production" means the cultivation of horticultural 
products including fruits, vegetables, flowers or ornamental plants, or the 
harvesting of wild horticultural products. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [289] 3 

Given under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 7 July 2020. 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS CHAIRMAN 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

Given under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 7 July 2020. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the arboriculture industry in relation to which 
An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its functions 
in the creation of statutory apprenticeships. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [289] 5
